pros: High caliper students. Fellow teachers are always willing to share ideas and help out. Working there is more like a fraternity of students and faculty working together to learn ans create.
cons: Not much work lately. They can attract more students by offering modern IT courses than by waiting for student population to increase first.

review_title: Bland, sleepy place for mediocre people
pros: Lots of vacation. Plenty of independence. No micro-management. Super nice people.
cons: No growth.  No one gets promoted. Raises are minuscule or non-existent. Senior people take credit for everything but don't do a whole lot.  (See above:  Plenty of independence. No micro-management. )  Low salaries.

pros: Atmosphere is casual and there is a real family feel on campus. Everyone is working towards the mission. Very positive experience.
cons: Paid Time Off policy is generous but requests for time off are often discouraged. Work life balance needs improving.
